Package oh_hecc.game_parts.passage

Interface PassageReadingInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Heccable, Parseable, SharedPassage
All Known Implementing Classes:
EditablePassage
public interface PassageReadingInterface
extends SharedPassage
This encapsulates all the passage functionality that's exclusively used for when passages are being read from .hecc format into actual usable objects.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from interface oh_hecc.Parseable

    PASSAGE_NAME_REGEX, PASSAGE_NAME_REGEX_WITH_WHITESPACE, STANDALONE_PASSAGE_NAME_REGEX_WITH_WHITESPACE

    • getInlineComment

      static java.lang.String getInlineComment​(java.lang.String lineEndMetadata)
      Obtains the inline comment from the end of the line end metadata
      Parameters:
      lineEndMetadata - the line end metadata
      Returns:
      The comment of it (everything between a // and the end of the line). returns empty string if no comment is found.
